title: Rediscovering Your Joy in Motherhood (Part 2 of 2)
itunes:author: Guest: Ashley Willis
itunes:summary:
Ashley Willis aims to encourage moms to hold tight to the peace of God through every moment of parenting. She introduces four “peace pirates” that steal joy and how to effectively combat them. (Part 2 of 2)


Receive the book "Peace Pirates" and the audio download of the broadcast "Rediscovering Your Joy in Motherhood" for your donation of any amount! Plus, receive member-exclusive benefits when you make a recurring gift today. Your monthly support helps families thrive: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-daily-broadcast-product-2022-09-06?refcd=1464112
